designations.source: A review of the status of the mayflies (Ephemeroptera) of Great Britain
designations.source_description: This report was commissioned to update the threat status of mayflies from work originally undertaken in date 1990, using the IUCN methodology for assessing threat.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: A taxon is Vulnerable when it is not Critically Endangered or Endangered but is facing a high risk of extinction in the wild in the medium term future.
designations.comments: Despite a recent increase in Area of Occupancy this species is still restricted to only two river catchments.  In the River Wye it remains restricted to 1 hectad however in the River Thames there has been a recent increase in the number of hectads recorded
